metadata.title: CVE-2024-1298 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: EDK2 contains a vulnerability when S3 sleep is activated where an Attackermay cause a Division-By-Zero due to a UNIT32 overflow via local access. Asuccessful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to a loss ofAvailability.

criterions.comment: edk2 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
